item.title: By: Alex James fans Blur reunion flames, Drawer B

item.description: [...] first time this decade, according to bassist Alex James. The band’s last record, 2003’s Think Tank, only featured guitarist Graham Coxon on one song, while its last record as a quartet, [...]
